languages.text: "И это все? Скука смертная. Вигдис, объяви боевую готовность".

traits.locale_text: "И это все? Скука смертная. Вигдис, объяви боевую готовность".

languages.text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."
languages.original_text: "И это все? Скука смертная. Вигдис, объяви боевую готовность".

traits.locale_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."
"That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."
"That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."
"That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

languages.text: “就这样吗？真是无聊透了。托里曼，告诉所有人，准备开战。”
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

traits.locale_text: “就这样吗？真是无聊透了。托里曼，告诉所有人，准备开战。”

languages.text: «¿Eso es todo? Qué tedioso. Toliman, alerte a todos los puestos. Entramos en combate».
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso es todo? Qué tedioso. Toliman, alerte a todos los puestos. Entramos en combate».

languages.text: 「それだけか？実につまらんな。トリマン、全ステーションに警告を。交戦準備だ」
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

traits.locale_text: 「それだけか？実につまらんな。トリマン、全ステーションに警告を。交戦準備だ」

languages.text: « C'est tout ? Je m'attendais à mieux. Toliman, prévenez tous les postes : qu'ils se préparent à attaquer. »
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout ? Je m'attendais à mieux. Toliman, prévenez tous les postes : qu'ils se préparent à attaquer. »

languages.text: "Ist das alles? Wie unfassbar langweilig! Toliman, alle Stationen in Kampfbereitschaft!"
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das alles? Wie unfassbar langweilig! Toliman, alle Stationen in Kampfbereitschaft!"

languages.text: "Bu kadar mıydı? Ne sıkıcısın. Toliman, tüm mevkileri uyar. Çatışmaya hazırlansınlar."
languages.original_text: "That's it? How terribly dull. Toliman, alert all stations: prepare to engage."
